pages.title: Forge Energy Power Tap
pages.text: The Forge Energy Power Tap allows you to extract energy from a Turbine.$(br2)Like it's name imply, this Power Tap output energy using the Forge Energy $(l:bigreactors:misc/powersystem)power system$(/l) and so it can be connected only to pipes or machines compatible with that system.

Only one $(l:bigreactors:misc/powersystem)power system$(/l) can be used for each Turbine and so only one type of Power Taps can be used to build a single Turbine.$(br2)The Power Tap is available in both $(l:bigreactors:misc/passiveactiveparts)passive and active$(/l) form.
$(l)Mandatory:$() no$(br)$(l)Valid positions:$() any face (not on frame)$(br)$(l)Variants:$() all$(br)$(l)Graphical interface:$() no$(br)$(l)Power system:$() Forge Energy
